resources.string:
Mix Color Application is an Application for combining two primary colors into a new color that is Secondary color. So the user can find out the combination of the two colors entered by the user by entering the primary color which is where this is the 1st color and the Secondary color becomes the 2nd color.

the combination between color %1$s and %2$s is %3$s
First color: %1$s Second color: %2$s The result of the two color combined is : %3$s
Enter the text you want to change
